snippet: Driven by parched conditions and widespread wildfires, many cities and towns across the country have decided to scrap their traditional displays.
abstract: Many cities and towns across the country, driven by parched conditions and widespread wildfires, have decided to scrap their traditional July 4th fireworks displays.
lead_paragraph: Driven by parched conditions and widespread wildfires, many cities and towns across the country have decided to scrap their traditional displays.

headline.seo: Fears of Fires Take Toll on Cities’ Fireworks Shows
headline.main: Fears of Fires Take Fireworks Out of July 4th Celebrations
headline.print_headline: Fears of Fires Take the Fireworks Out of Cities’ July 4th Celebrations
